altTitles.en: あなたが触れるたびに

description.en:
The first work in the tankōbon series by Dr.P, centered around a certain high school where good things happen. Most of the time it follows a two chapters per couple formula, also main characters from certain arcs emerge as supporting characters in other episodes of the story all the time. Sweet vanilla straight from the master of the genre.

A collection of mostly 2-chapter stories about five different girls.

1-2. Fumi-San's Melancholy
Being a butt fetishist, Fumi's new boyfriend has been lax when it comes to their relationship development. It's up to Fumi to show him how much of her there is to love.

3-4. Help Me Relax!
Tired from training, Yuu requests the help of her childhood friend for a post-exercise massage. Later on she makes sure to return the favor.

5-6. I Want To Be Assaulted
Yagi confesses to Oogami her fantasy of being assaulted, and that she wants him to be the one to do it.

7-8. Seki-San Non-Stop!
Seki finally confessed her feelings to her Sensei and they were accepted, the only problem is that she won't let him rest for even a second.

9-10. Suzu-Neechan's Fiance
Suzu is the school's nurse but she also happens to be Keisuke's older cousin. Recently Keisuke learned that she's "taken" and wants to find out who it is exactly that stole her heart.

11. Fumi-San Impact
Afraid that her actions have irreparably hurt her boyfriend Yanai, Fumi asks him directly why he's changed so much since they started dating.

*Bonus Manga #1-5 (a one-page chapter for each pairing)
